mapper.insert: insert into chatroom values ( chatroom_idx.nextval , #{ croom_userid}, #{croom_coachid}, #{croom_req_idx}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select a.* from (select * from message where msg_croom_idx = #{croom_idx} order by msg_sendtime desc)a where rownum = 1

select * from chatroom left outer join (select a.* from (select * from message order by msg_sendtime desc)a where rownum = 1)msg
on croom_userid = #{id} and croom_idx= msg_croom_idx(+)

select * from chatroom left outer join (select a.* from (select * from message order by msg_sendtime desc)a where rownum = 1)msg
on croom_coachid = #{id} and croom_idx= msg_croom_idx(+)
